tweets.text: @BBCPanorama @BBCOne Why will the @EnvAgency not appear on @BBCPanorama to explain why hundreds/thousands of illegal sewage leaks have resorted in just 4 fines in 2020? What incentive is that for commercial water companies to act? @WindrushWasp

tweets.text:
@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @WHO I loved that job although it was scary when one end of the house tried to fall off before we fixed it 
Loved our time in Stoke - great turnout of trades, volunteers & suppliers
Lovely family
Also loved the Stoke garden @The_RHS Chelsea with all the school kids few years back

Oak trees to be felled. @GeorgeMonbiot @ECOWARRIORSS @TransportActio2 @bearwitness2019 @SaveStonehenge @WWoodlanders @Independent @CornwallLive @EdwinaHannaford @guardianeco @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/0ogXekySX1

tweets.text: @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency Could you recommend anyone Nick? Not really done anything like this before, we aren't activists or anything just normal people trying stop our kids getting gassed. The data that was collected from the MMFs showed levels of H2S to be above @WHO levels for health problems.
@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Have you considered getting a green lobby group involved? They might be able to fund a legal challenge?

@MrNickKnowles @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @MrNickKnowles you honestly wouldn't recognise S-O-T and N-U-L anymore. The people are still wonderful but we are fast losing our spirit. Being tortured this way and trapped in our homes is enough to push anyone to breaking point. #stinkstopthe

üö® 'The River Pollution Scandal' is airing now on @BBCOne.üö®

Tune in and let us know your thoughts about the investigation by using the #BBCPanorama hashtag or replying to this tweet. ‚Üì https://t.co/uL7wLh0RiQ
